lead_paragraph: A Texas congresswoman will repay thousands of dollars, after acknowledging that she gave awards to four of her relatives and a staff member’s two children.
snippet: A Texas congresswoman will repay thousands of dollars, after acknowledging that she gave awards to four of her relatives and a staff member’s two children.

headline.main: Scholarships Are Focus of Questions on Ethics
headline.seo: Congresswoman Repays Scholarships That Broke Rules
headline.print_headline: Scholarships Are Focus Of Questions On Ethics
